Submodules¶

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm module¶

class amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm.MCTSAlgorithm(max_simulations, max_time)¶

Bases: Algorithm

Abstract class for the MCTS algorithm

Attributes:

_max_simulations: max number of simulations _simulations: current number of simulations _max_time: max time allowed to choose a move _end: end instant for the algorithm _root: root node _current_state: current node _leaf_nodes: current leaf nodes

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

abstract make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen by the algorithm

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm.ucb_score(node, c)¶

Function to calculate the standard ucb score :param node: node to calculate ucb score :param c: exploration parameter :return: the calculated ucb score

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy module¶

class amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy.MCTSAlgorithmE(max_simulations, max_time, epsilon=0.1)¶

Bases: MCTSAlgorithm

Class for the MCTS Epsilon-Greedy algorithm

Attributes:

epsilon: epsilon probability value, by default 0.1

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen by the algorithm :raises ValueError if a valid move is not found

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy.calculate_probability(node, nodes)¶

Function to calculate probability of selecting a node given the rest of the nodes :param node: node to calculate the probability :param nodes: rest of the nodes :return: probability of the node

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy_mod module¶

epsilon: epsilon probability value, by default 0.1

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen by the algorithm :raises ValueError if a valid move is not found

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy_mod.calculate_probability(node, nodes)¶

Function to calculate probability of selecting a node given the rest of the nodes :param node: node to calculate the probability :param nodes: rest of the nodes :return: probability of the node

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy_mod.calculate_reward(delta_moves)¶

Method to calculate the reward of a finished games given the difference in available moves :param delta_moves: difference in available moves :return: reward

amazons.algorithms.mcts.mcts_algorithm_e_greedy_mod.calculate_reward_1_1(delta_moves)¶

Deprecated, old way to calculate reward :param delta_moves: difference in available moves :return: reward
